attributes.action: Fully investigate the premium rate phone-in television game show scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fully investigate the premium rate phone-in television game show scams that have pervaded our television channels and prosecute those responsible for cheating the public by not allowing their phone-in entries to be included in the draws, which amounts to criminal fraud.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
